song.englishname: Snap Your Fingers, Snap Your Neck

english.segment1: Nothing breeds more contempt for this world. Than memories now formed. Every moment a new seed. Is grown to no reason, the trouble unfolds. For the trials of today. I'm no jury, really don't care how you feel. The pleasant notion of miraculous change. Drifts into multiple jeers
english.segment2: [Chorus]. You want the good life. You break your back. You snap your fingers, you snap your neck
english.segment3: Seconds drip thru my hands. Washed of moments unborn. All the spaces between bleed. A tribute to a sacrament never exposed. A message to the forces, I've no pity, don't know how thankful to feel. Expectations of my daily bread. Gives me the hunger to steal
